name: iLogos
tag_list: offshore-development, web, outsourcing, ukraine, social-applications, social-games, graphics, art
overview:
ILogos is your advanced development team! If your company or start-up is looking for dependable turnkey software support, graphic design and art partner-developer, iLogos is ready to become it!, as has already become for: Playnatic Entertainment, Aurora Interactive, Webgames, Nekki, Vertigo games, etc! We are proud of our reputation and experience, which may be valuable for you. Find more information about services of iLogos company.

  • Hide Full description Experience As a professional development team iLogos has been established in 2003 and has got huge experience working on outsourcing market. Main focus is professional software engineering and the companyâ€™s expertise covers all major IT engineering areas such as online games, social applications development, web, desktop, mobile application development, planning, supporting and other it services. Effective cooperation with iLogos starts with solid process management aided by flexibility and transparency of our contract agreements. Our partners from the USA, Europe, Russia, Ukraine are provided with rational and effective project supervision coupled with complete security of their plans and ideas.

Staff Team consists of gifted managers, team leaders, programmers and designers (all the staff is situated in the companyâ€™s office in Lugansk, Ukraine). Effective management, transparent development process, high extent of responsibility.

Business models of cooperation:

  • Completion of Fixed price projects
  • Programmer/ team of programmers allocation
  • Offshore development center Find more information about additional services of iLogos company.

Tools/Technologies: Flash, Flex, Flash lite, Adobe AIR, ActionScript AS2, AS3, Flash Media Server, Red5, HTTP/SMTP, HTML, CSS, XML, PHP 5.3, Smarty, Zend Framework, AJAX, jQuery, Prototype, Java SE/EE, MySQL, Sockets, Smartfox Server, nGinx, Apache, etc. More technologiesâ€¦

Totally: More than 200 fulfilled projects (software development, graphic design and art, online games and social application development).

We are always interested in establishing long-term mutually beneficial cooperation!
